section.p: This website, as well as all the material on this website (including, without limitation, the text, source code, photographs, images,) are property of Christina Sophonpanich and are copyright protected under Lila, Chop! 2014.
No part of this website or any of its contents may be reproduced, copied, modified or adapted, without the prior written consent of the author, unless otherwise indicated for stand-alone materials.
Commercial use and distribution of the contents of the website is not allowed without express and prior written consent of the author.
Licensing inquiries and requests for general distribution can be sent out to christina@lilachop.com.

If you would like to share a recipe from this site, you are more than welcome to post a photo and link back directly to the recipe and instructions on this site; republishing recipes, complete or partial, is strictly forbidden without express and prior written consent of the author. Note that making a few minor substitutions or rewriting a recipe in your own words does not make said recipe your own. If you liked a recipe enough to feel the need to share it, please respectfully link back to the original work.

Links to products and services on third-party websites (affiliate links) may be included in some of my posts. If you click on an affiliate link and make a purchase I may receive a small commission, which helps keep this place alive. Certain ads that may appear in this site may also contain some of these affiliate links, to which the same conditions apply.

The information contained in this website is for general information purposes only. The information is provided by lilachop.com and whilst we endeavour to keep the information up to date and correct, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability or availability with respect to the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk.

In no event will we be liable for any loss or damage including without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any loss or damage whatsoever arising from loss of data or profits arising out of, or in connection with, the use of this website.

No representations are made about the accuracy of the information contained in any page on this site or referred to from this site, and there is no promise or guarantee that anything contained herein is correct, complete or up-to-date.

Through this website you are able to link to other websites which are not under the control of lilachop.com. We have no control over the nature, content and availability of those sites. The inclusion of any links does not necessarily imply a recommendation or endorse the views expressed within them.

Anonymous visitor information is recorded by Facebook Insights used to determine site traffic for the purpose of determining blog growth and site statistics. This information is never shared or sold. Furthermore, this information is gathered through the use of cookies, which you have the liberty to turn off at any time by modifying your Internet browserâ€™s settings.
